scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross at the center. He is shown with a halo, wearing a loincloth, and bleeding from wounds. To his left, the Virgin Mary, veiled in blue, mourns with other figures. To his right, a man in a pink tunic and blue hose points, while a figure in ornate golden armor with a tall headdress stands beside him. In the background, a stylized cityscape with towers and buildings is visible against a blue sky and a gold ground, suggesting a symbolic or heavenly setting.
